    Method
    Description
    UserAction
    UserTrackingService.addUserFootprint(UserAction a, UserSession session)
    Adds a new annotation to the database and returns the event with an updated annotationId, to make sure the annotationId stays unique
    UserAction
    UserTrackingService.addUserTrackingEvent(UserAction a, UserSession session)
    Adds a new tracking event to the database and returns the event with an updated annotationId, to make sure the annotationId stays unique
    FootprintList
    UserTrackingService.getFootprints(String mediapackageId, String userId)
    Returns a list of footprints, if a userId is passed only the footprints of that user are returned.

    Get a single user action by its identifier.

    UserTrackingService.getUserActions(int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByDay(String day, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given day (YYYYMMDD)
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByType(String key, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given key
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByTypeAndDay(String key, String day, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given key and day
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByTypeAndMediapackageId(String key, String mediapackageId, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given key and mediapackage id
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByTypeAndMediapackageIdByDate(String key, String mediapackageId, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given key and mediapackage id ordered by date.
    UserActionList
    UserTrackingService.getUserActionsByTypeAndMediapackageIdByDescendingDate(String key, String mediapackageId, int offset, int limit)
    Returns annotations of a given key and mediapackage id ordered descending by date.

    UserTrackingService.getViews(String mediapackageId)
